about_the_game:
Radu Vladislas from Full Moon Features’ “Subspecies” descends upon the world of Horror Legends. Includes over 20 new unlockable skins and 2 new playable characters with brand new abilities.


Play as Radu

Anders Hove reprises his role from the classic horror films as the voice of Radu accompanied by the haunting original film score of The Aman Folk Orchestra. Reap the blood and souls of your hapless victims with Radu’s iconic sword and dagger and their ravenous finishing moves, empowered with the blood of saints from the Bloodstone itself.


The “Subspecies” scurry out from the darkness.

Radu Vladislas does not hunt alone, his demonic minions the “Subspecies” are never far behind. These skulking demons stalk and terrorize their master’s prey, growing more numerous when the vampire feasts upon another victim as the players slaughtered by Radu become his dreadful servants.


A bloody tribute to the classics.

In addition to being able to play as the dark horrors Radu Vladislas and his “Subspecies” minions, this DLC offers 7 unlockable skins for the dread vampire and his malevolent underlings. You will also gain access to 10 new skins for your cast members featuring the branding of the iconic horror film studio Full Moon Features.



  • New Legend: Radu Vladislas
  • New Minion: Subspecies
  • 10 Cast skins featuring Full Moon branded T-shirts!
  • 7 Unlockable skins for Radu
  • 7 Unlockable skin for the Subspecies

name: Horror Legends - Subspecies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher; 64 bit version
  • Processor: Intel i5-4790K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790K
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Radu from Full Moon Features’ iconic film series Subspecies invades the world of Horror Legends as a new playable Legend. Includes over 20 new unlockable skins and 2 new playable characters with brand new abilities.
